import{memo,useCallback,useState}from"react";import{HeaderOnly}from"../templates/layout/HeaderOnly";import{Box,Divider,Flex,Heading,Input,Stack,Image,ButtonGroup,FormLabel,VisuallyHiddenInput}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{PrimaryButton}from"../atoms/button/PrimaryButton";import{useEditProfile}from"../../hooks/useEditProfile";import{useRecoilState}from"recoil";import{EmployeeState,EmployeeImageState,EmployeeNameState,EmployeeFullNameState,EmployeeHobbiesState}from"../../contexts/EmployeeState";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const EditProfile=/*#__PURE__*/memo(()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{updateProfile,loading}=useEditProfile();const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const[previewUrl,setPreviewUrl]=useState(null);const[employeeState,setEmployeeState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeState);const[employeeImageState,setEmployeeImageState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeImageState);const[employeeNameState,setEmployeeNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeNameState);const[employeeFullNameState,setEmployeeFullNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeFullNameState);const[employeeHobbiesState,setEmployeeHobbiesState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeHobbiesState);const onChangeEmployeeName=useCallback(e=>setEmployeeNameState(e.target.value),[employeeNameState]);const onChangeEmployeeFullName=useCallback(e=>setEmployeeFullNameState(e.target.value),[employeeFullNameState]);const onChangeHobbies=useCallback(e=>setEmployeeHobbiesState(e.target.value),[employeeHobbiesState]);const handleCancelButton=()=>{navigate("/home/setting");};//画像のプレビュー表示
const handleFileChange=event=>{const file=event.target.files[0];if(file){setSelectedFile(file);console.log(file);console.log(selectedFile);setPreviewUrl(URL.createObjectURL(file));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderOnly,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{align:"center",justify:"center",height:"120vh",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{bg:"white",w:"sm",p:4,borderRadius:"md",shadow:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h1",size:"lg",textAlign:"center",children:"\u30D7\u30ED\u30D5\u30A3\u30FC\u30EB\u7DE8\u96C6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{my:4}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{spacing:6,py:10,px:10,children:[previewUrl!=null?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{borderRadius:"full",boxSize:"160px",src:previewUrl,alt:"\u753B\u50CF",m:"auto",bg:"gray.100",textAlign:"center"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{borderRadius:"full",boxSize:"160px",src:"data:image/jpeg;base64,".concat(employeeImageState),alt:"\u753B\u50CF",m:"auto",bg:"gray.100",textAlign:"center"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormLabel,{htmlFor:"image_uploads",border:"solid",_hover:{cursor:"pointer",opacity:0.8},textAlign:"center",children:"\u30A2\u30C3\u30D7\u30ED\u30FC\u30C9\u753B\u50CF\u3092\u9078\u629E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VisuallyHiddenInput,{type:"file",id:"image_uploads",padding:"5px",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleFileChange,multiple:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u793E\u54E1ID",type:"text",value:employeeState,name:"employeeId",readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u30CB\u30C3\u30AF\u30CD\u30FC\u30E0",type:"text",value:employeeNameState,name:"employeeName",onChange:onChangeEmployeeName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u30D5\u30EB\u30CD\u30FC\u30E0",type:"text",value:employeeFullNameState,name:"employeeFullName",onChange:onChangeEmployeeFullName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u8DA3\u5473",type:"text",value:employeeHobbiesState,name:"hobbies",onChange:onChangeHobbies}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ButtonGroup,{gap:"2",spacing:"20",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrimaryButton,{onClick:handleCancelButton,children:"\u30AD\u30E3\u30F3\u30BB\u30EB"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrimaryButton,{loading:loading,onClick:()=>updateProfile({imageFile:selectedFile,employeeId:employeeState,employeeName:employeeNameState,employeeFullName:employeeFullNameState,hobbies:employeeHobbiesState}),children:"\u66F4\u65B0"})]})})]})]})})})});});
